channel.title: PDB-XPW on Rapid Control Prototyping (RCP)
channel.description: Recent content in PDB-XPW on Rapid Control Prototyping (RCP)

item.title: MATEKSYS PDB-XPW Dual BEC & Current Module tweak to increase current measurement sensitivity
item.description: Adapt the MATEKSYS PDB-XPW power module for quad rotor to fit electric RC plane with lower current requirements. Change current measurement range by replacing one single resistor from the Op-Amp current measurement circuit.
